title: What is the counter play for the new jungle item Stalkers Blade?
body:
PASSIVE - CHILLING SMITE Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing 28-164 true damage and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 2 seconds 

The 50% slow is just too much.

replies.body:
so many champs have much better slows...

the damage is negligible.

who even builds that smite honestly? someone lacking ANY form of CC in the jungle? ive tried it on many who have it as recommended and the other smites (apart from poachers) work infinitely better.

hell, ive seen WWs get it....they lose out on so much by not getting the dueling smite...
i personally think that the smite should have a reduced cooldown if used on a champ, or if the smited champ is killed, this would give ganking champs a better chance to farm and gank.
Warding and better positioning goes a long way.
Tenacity to a certain degree. I think this item shouldn't deal any damage.
